TopicTitle: "Control from here" added to AG options.

Articles.Content: I know that improved action groups is well-represented in the "Already Suggested" post, but I would like to humbly request that "Control from here" be added to the list of available action group options (for appropriate parts, of course.)

Yes, please. The specific case where I wish for this is with a VTOL plane, I put a docking port along the spine for VTOL operations and a conventional cockpit for horizontal flight. It would be great to be able to switch between modes with an action group rather than by right-clicking.

May I ask people to look at this thread?

This is pretty much exactly the suggestions of the sort I am looking for.

(Note that I've been intending to do that mod for a while, but I did not actually start the thread for it until I saw this post.)

D.
An option to set main control part in VAB would also be nice (same as control from here in flight, but can select in VAB if launching and not using the root part for orientation).
